name: Ronin Neko
description:
"Nyan-wards, to justice!"

Run towards justice with Ronin Neko, bring the truth to light about what happened behind the Neko Village!

Ronin Neko is a time killer - a running escape game with a cute Ninja Cat as a mascot. The game is an endless runner type of game made as a part of Mojiken Camp 2022, the internship program at Mojiken Studio in a week's time. Feedback is appreciated and I hope you have fun playing the game!

Game Controls 

P to jump/double jump

L to fall faster

SPACE  key to throw kunai

Credits
